p: The antidiabetic activity of the leaves extract of R. mucronata showed promising results in streptozocin diabetic rats. The extract reduced oxidative stress and increased antioxidants activity, and it had an insulin-mimetic effect. Also, flavonoids could play an important role in the prevention of β-cell apoptosis, and the promotion of β-cell propagation, beside the secretion and enhancement of insulin activity [ 31].
